events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund for the mistake as soon as possible.
Classified the customer's issue as a refund request due to receiving the wrong product in their shipment.
Assigned the refund case to agent Sarah M. for further handling and resolution.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can process the refund quickly?
Here is my order number #123456 and attached photo of the item I received, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method and arrange a free return pickup for the incorrect product.
That sounds great, thank you for your quick response and the refund arrangement. I appreciate the help.
The refund has been processed and a pickup for the incorrect item is scheduled within the next 3 days. Please let us know if you need anything else.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and that the pickup went smoothly. Please let us know if further assistance is needed.
We are closing this case now as the refund has been completed and no further issues have been reported. Thank you for contacting support.
